## ARS data for Reporting event

1. **ARS model - schema**
    - Defined - https://github.com/cdisc-org/analysis-results-standard/tree/main/model
    
2. **Map ARS data**:
    - Template: https://github.com/cdisc-org/analysis-results-standard/tree/main/utilities/python
        - convert excel to yaml: excel2yaml
    - TFL designer
        - Create mock shells, get excel, yaml, json
    - LLM
        - Use mock shells, protocol, ars model and create yaml and/json ars data
    
3. **Validate** ARS data against the ARS schema.

4. If not ARS data is not json - **convert ARS Data** to json 

## Generating the ARD

### For R

For R use the siera package

- Motivation: [www.cdisc.org](https://www.cdisc.org/sites/default/files/pdf/360i-Program-Kickoff20250218.pdf)


### For SAS

For SAS use the ARD generator

- [Wallendszus_ARD-Generator_CDISC-Europe-Interchange-2024](https://www.cdisc.org/sites/default/files/2024-04/Wallendszus_ARD-Generator_CDISC-Europe-Interchange-2024.pdf)

- [ard-generator](https://github.com/KarlWallendszus/ard-generator)
